section.p: You find an open window and squeeze through into a long hall. Your foot, however, snags on a thin wire stretched across the floor. The wire triggers a loud bell-like gonging that alerts the temple. You have little choice but to run for your life - warrior priests swarm out of the temple and the iron statues at its gates come to life to join in the chase.
